pagetip: Selling stuff? This section is where youâ€™ll keep track of your orders, add items to sell, and manage inventory.
learn:
This is an important section to keep an eye on! It's where you'll see and export your orders as well as define the items you're selling.

When exporting keep in mind that recent orders refers to all the orders that have been placed since your last export.

copy.firstuse: CASH Commerce Items are used to represent anything you would like to sell through the platform. (Albums, Singles, Merchandise) etc. Before you can begin selling items you will need to connect to one of the payment platforms from below.
